data:
User: I want to schedule an appointment for tomorrow. Do you have any time available?
Assistant: Thank you for contacting us. We will contact you by phone, but we need some additional information. May I please have your full name and phone number. If you have an email address, that would be helpful as well, but it is optional.
Could you please tell me your name?
User: My name is Ann Clark. My phone number is (617) 545-1356. My email is ann@artgal.com. Do you have a time available for tomorrow?
Assistant: Thanks ! We'll contact you very soon for a session on
